Package org.apfloat.internal

Class FloatDataStorageBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.apfloat.internal.AbstractDataStorageBuilder
org.apfloat.internal.FloatDataStorageBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataStorageBuilder
public class FloatDataStorageBuilder extends AbstractDataStorageBuilder
Default data storage creation strategy for the float data type.
Version:
1.8.2
Author:
Mikko Tommila
See Also:
FloatMemoryDataStorage, FloatDiskDataStorage
